metadata.title: CVE-2019-9200 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer underwrite exists in ImageStream::getLine() located atStream.cc in Poppler 0.74.0 that can (for example) be triggered by sendinga crafted PDF file to the pdfimages binary. It allows an attacker to causeDenial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13').
